steps.name: I am on the DVLAs Vehicles Information Page
I proceed with checking specific details of vehicles as below:

elements.name: Enter a valid vehicle registration number and get the make and colour of vehicle

steps.name: I search with a "valid vehicleRegNumber" and click to continue
I should be able to see the "vehicle make" and the "vehicle colour" displayed
I am on the DVLAs Vehicles Information Page
I proceed with checking specific details of vehicles as below:

elements.name: Enter an invalid vehicle registration number and receive an error message

steps.name: I enter an "invalid vehicleRegNumber" on the searchField and click to continue
I should be able to see an "error message" displayed for invalid registration number
I am on the DVLAs Vehicles Information Page
I proceed with checking specific details of vehicles as below:

elements.name: Enter a wrong vehicle registration number and receive an error page with an error message

steps.name: I enter a "wrongVehicle regNumber" on the searchField
I click on the continue button
I should be navigated to an error page with "detailsNotFound error"
I am on the DVLAs Vehicles Information Page
I proceed with checking specific details of vehicles as below:

name: Getting Vehicle Details
description:
As a user
I want to be able to get the details of some vehicles of my choice
So that I can validate the makes and colours of these vehicles.
